name: title
ClusteredNetwork_pub: Spiking Attractor Model of Motor Cortex: Modulating Neural and Behavioral Variability via Prior Target Information

name: description
ClusteredNetwork_pub: This DataLad dataset contains a variant of the analysis described by Rostami et al. in https://doi.org/10.21203/rs.3.rs-1337724/v1 (Spiking Attractor Model of Motor Cortex: Modulating Neural and Behavioral Variability via Prior Target Information). It focuses on demonstrating computational reproducibility and contains a subset of original results.
